title: New: Only Real – Get It On
body: Being one of the few UK artists to grace the line-up of Paris’s [Pitchfork Festival](http://pitchfork.com/news/51598-ariel-pink-a-trak-savages-youth-lagoon-majical-cloudz-join-pitchfork-music-festival-paris/), there’s a certain weight of expectation upon the shoulders of London’s **Only Real**. With his first release on LuvLuvLuv Records out next month, an EP titled **_Days In The City_**, Niall Galvin draws from the likes of Beastie Boys and Tribe Called Quest, yet merging these influences with a modern, more anthemic style. _Get It On_, the first track to be taken from the aforementioned EP is a straight out jam, garage-rock riffs mixed with the laidback, intelligent delivery of Galvin. Check it out below.
